description: A relational e-commerce database with customer orders, products, and supplier information

customers.description: Customer dimension table containing customer demographics and segmentation

customer_id.description: Unique identifier for each customer (format: C###)

join_date.description: Date when customer created their account (ISO format)

customer_segment.description: Customer tier: Standard, Premium, or VIP based on purchase history

products.description: Product dimension table with catalog information and pricing

product_id.description: Unique identifier for each product (format: P###)

product_name.description: Full product name as displayed to customers

category.description: Main product category (Electronics, Groceries, Sports, Home)

subcategory.description: Product subcategory within the main category

supplier_id.description: Reference to the supplier providing this product

orders.description: Order fact table containing order header information

order_id.description: Unique identifier for each order (format: ORD###)

customer_id.description: Reference to the customer who placed the order

order_date.description: Date when order was placed (ISO format)

shipping_method.description: Shipping speed: Standard, Express, or Next Day

payment_method.description: Payment type: Credit Card, Debit Card, or PayPal

order_status.description: Current status: Pending, Processing, Shipped, or Delivered

discount_applied.description: Total discount amount in USD applied to order

order_items.description: Order line items fact table with individual products per order

order_item_id.description: Unique identifier for each line item (format: OI###)

unit_price_at_sale.description: Price per unit at time of purchase in USD

total_price.description: Line item total (quantity Ã— unit price) in USD

suppliers.description: Supplier dimension table with vendor information

supplier_id.description: Unique identifier for each supplier (format: SUP###)

lead_time_days.description: Average days from order to delivery
